law.history: Repealed 1996 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 83, effective December 12, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 15, sec. 95, effective April 4, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990; -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 22, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 12.
